tool_description: Analyzes streaming performance metrics and provides optimization recommendations for encoding parameters, buffer settings, and delivery configuration.

average_bitrate_kbps.description: Average streaming bitrate over recent period

buffer_underrun_count.description: Number of buffer underruns in recent period

quality_switches_count.description: Number of quality switches in recent period

rebuffer_ratio.description: Percentage of time spent rebuffering (0.0 to 100.0)

error_messages: Invalid bitrate: average_bitrate_kbps must be positive
Invalid counts: buffer_underrun_count and quality_switches_count must be non-negative integers
Invalid startup time: startup_time_ms must be positive
Invalid rebuffer ratio: rebuffer_ratio must be between 0.0 and 100.0
Invalid targets: target values must be positive and reasonable
usage: Input recent streaming performance metrics to receive optimization recommendations for improving playback quality and reducing interruptions.

overall_quality_score.description: Overall streaming quality score from 0.0 to 10.0
